sentence: salesforce.com, inc. ( CRM ) is a cloud computing solution provider that could be an interesting play for investors.
That is because, not only does the stock have decent short-term momentum, but it is seeing solid activity on the earnings estimate revision front as well.
These positive earnings estimate revisions suggest that analysts are becoming more optimistic on CRM's earnings for the coming quarter and year.
In fact, consensus estimates have moved sharply higher for both of these time frames over the past four weeks, suggesting that salesforce.com could be a solid choice for investors.
In the past 30 days, 1 estimate has gone higher for salesforce.com while none have gone lower in the same time period.
The trend has been pretty favorable too, with estimates increasing from 3 cents a share 30 days ago, to 4 cents today, a move of 33.3%.
Meanwhile, salesforce.com's current year figures are also looking quite promising.
The consensus estimate trend has seen a boost for this time frame, increasing from 12 cents per share 30 days ago to 13 cents per share today, an increase of 8.3%.
The stock has also started to move higher lately, adding 10.6% over the past four weeks, suggesting that investors are starting to take note of this impressive story.
So investors may definitely want to consider this Zacks Rank #2 (Buy) stock to profit in the near future.
